event1.name: Carnival Presents - Winter Fest
event1.location: Carnival World, adjacent to Winterland, Ghaznavi Block Sector F Bahria Town, Lahore, Pakistan, Bahria Town, Lahore
event1.description: Step into the magic of the season with Winter Fest — Winter World’s biggest winter celebration! A thrilling 17-day carnival taking over Winter World, Bahria Town, Lahore from 19th December to 4th January. Event Timings: Carnival Hours: 3:00 PM – 12:00 AM Daily Circus Performances: * 6:00 PM – 8:00 PM * 8:00 PM – 10:00 PM * 10:00 PM – 12:00 AM What’s in Store: Get ready for nonstop entertainment with daily circus-style acts including fire shows, jugglers, clowns, dagger performances, hula hoops, wire balancing, stilt walkers, unicycles, and many more high-energy attractions. Festival Highlights: Watch Winter World transform into a breathtaking festive wonderland with a 30-foot Christmas tree, giant illuminated teddy bear, sparkling lights, themed props, immersive photo spots, and a life-size snow globe. Plus, enjoy rides, games, and a wide variety of food stalls, ideal for families, friends, and kids. Standard Ticket: Entry and Circus Entertainment - Rs. 500 Premium Ticket : Entry, Circus & Carnival Rides) - Rs. 1500

event2.name: PakWheels Karachi AutoShow
event2.location: Port Grand - Karachi, Pakistan, Near Napier Mole Bridge, Karachi
event2.description: Get ready for the ultimate automotive experience at the Karachi AutoShow 2025, an exclusive event showcasing the latest innovations, futuristic car designs, and cutting-edge technology in the automobile industry. Whether you're an enthusiast, collector, or just curious about the future of cars, this is the place to be!
